ctx: intros a b p q s Hplus Hlt.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros a b p q s Hplus Hlt. apply plusP_inv in Hplus. destruct Hplus as [l1 [Hlt1 [Hplus1 Heq1]] | [Hlt2 [Hplus2 Heq2]]]. - apply plusP_inv1 in Hplus1. rewrite pluspf. rewrite Heq1. reflexivity. - apply plusP_inv1 in Hplus2. rewrite pluspf. symmetry in Heq2. apply eqT_sym in Heq2. apply plusP_inv1 in Hplus2. rewrite Heq2. rewrite pluspf. reflexivity.
